channel.title: Money Pouch
channel.description: I successfully added the Money Pouch but when you put money into it the amount doesn't show up. Its just blank but I know its in there because I can withdraw the money from it. Also when I click "Examine" it says "Your Money Pouch currently has [font=arial black][size=14pt]null[/size][/font] coins". If anyone can help me fix these I will gladly REP++ them. :)

item.title: Money Pouch
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I added that and it didn’t do anything.
I have taken a screenshot of what it is doing.
EDIT:
When I add this:

if(coinToggle){ int cash; String Cash = RSInterface.interfaceCache[8135].disabledMessage; cash = Integer.parseInt(Cash); coinPart.drawSprite(400+11+32, 87); smallText.method382(getMoneyOrbColor(cash), 485, RSInterface.interfaceCache[8134].disabledMessage+"", 102, true); }
I get this error upon clicking the money pouch:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NumberFormatException: null at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.method146(client.java:12912) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9062) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9776) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5430) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Money Pouch
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I successfully added the Money Pouch but when you put money into it the amount doesn’t show up. Its just blank but I know its in there because I can withdraw the money from it.
Also when I click “Examine” it says “Your Money Pouch currently has [font=arial black][size=14pt]null[/size][/font] coins”.
If anyone can help me fix these I will gladly REP++ them.
